name: Antonio Roger
bio: Aspiring AI student passionate about problem-solving, innovation, and applying AI technologies to build impactful solutions. Experienced in AI-driven development, enthusiastic about continuous learning and creative problem-solving.

achievements.title: Runner-Up, Cisco Cohort7 Hackathon
achievements.description: We made it into the Top 20 finalists of Cisco's ThingQbator Cohort 7 and finished as Runners-Up. What started as a fun idea turned into a serious build after weeks of iteration. This journey opened doors to NASSCOM Foundation incubation support, and we're now officially MCA registered startup.

careerObjective: Passionate about leveraging AI/ML and modern web technologies to solve real-world problems. Seeking opportunities to work on innovative projects that make a difference.
